title: On A Mac And LOL Wont Open
body:
I have tried the usual re-install and launch from launchpad things, but every time I try and open it it either immediately closes the launcher or it brings up the pop-up box that there is more than one instance of the launcher running (both if I open once or twice+). I have been having this problem for the past two days (not including today)





If anyone can help me fix this, I would be very grateful...

replies.body: Your initial patcher might be having delays while trying to connect our servers and download assets, so it's still trying to while you open another.  I suggest starting out with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions.  Let me know if you have any questions!
